summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the reassessment and reassessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 875 for the improvement of Utah Street, from Connecticut Street the Canal Waterway, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing a 24-foot plank roadway, as provided by Ordinance No. 10306, under Ordinance No. 32904 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
